name: UNIF ROM File
summary: Learn about .UNF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The UNF ROM file is saved in the Universal NES Image Format (UNIF) as an alternative for storing NES and Famicom images. It was originally developed by Tennessee Carmel-Veilleux but then abandoned in 2008. In 2011, the UNIF format was then added to the libunif project and has since been maintained.
NOTE: The .UNIF file extension is also used to store NES and Famicom ROMs but is not as common as the UNF extension.

description: Game ROM created from Nintendo Entertainment System (NES) or Famicom video games; opened and played on a computer using the Nestopia emulator.
